name: TURBO ISLAND PURGER (itch)
description:
TURBO ISLAND PURGER is a satisfying fast-paced action game with skill-based combat. It is set in alternative 80's retro environment with beautiful low poly style.

Because of the software malfunction, robots that once used to serve people, now turned against them.  It is your job to eliminate them so that people can get back to living peacefully on the islands.

You will quickly notice that robots are superior to you while on the ground. Use your agility: perform wall-runs, deflect projectiles mid-air and dash in order to quickly take advantage over your enemies!

FEATURES

  • Skill-based, satisfying combat
  • Simple, intuitive controls
  • 18 perks
  • 7 weapons
  • Gorgeous low poly style
  • Normal and hardcore mode
  • Permadeath!

YOU CAN HELP TO CREATE THE MOST AMAZING GAMING EXPERIENCE BY FILLING THIS SHORT FORM AFTER YOU PLAY THE PROTOTYPE. THANKS!

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS PRE-ALPHA VERSION OF THE GAME CREATED IN 3 WEEKS. ITS GOAL IS TO GATHER EARLY FEEDBACK ON THE IDEA AND MECHANICS.

FULL GAME WILL FEATURE THINGS LIKE: 

  • Procedurally generated islands
  • More advanced combat with enemies (better behaviours, overall better design, occasional bosses which will test your skills even more)
  • Much much MUCH more perks and weapons
  • Unlockable characters - balanced, so that each of them has their strenghts and weaknesses
  • CO-OP (local and online) - because it will maximize the fun this game has to offer you

IT IS DEVELOPED BY ONE PERSON FULL-TIME.

ONCE AGAIN, THANKS FOR FILLING THE FEEDBACK FORM !
